member.name: T:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.Alert
member.summary: Represents the alert (i.e. tracker-related event fired according to the ).

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.Alert.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique alert ID.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.Alert.AlertPolicyId
member.summary: Gets or sets the ID of the alert policy which caused the alert.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.Alert.TrackerId
member.summary: Gets or sets the ID of the tracker which caused the alert.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.Alert.VehicleId
member.summary: Gets or sets the ID of the vehicle which caused the alert.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.Alert.Location
member.summary: Gets or sets the GPS location of the alert. X stands for longitude in range [-180, 180]. Y stands for latitude in range [-90, 90]. Z (optional) stands for altitude (meters).

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.Alert.CreateDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the record create date.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.Alert.MarkedAsReadDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the date the alert was marked as read by the user. Alert considered unread until this property is not set.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.Alert.AlertPolicy
member.summary: Gets or sets the alert policy which caused the alert.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.Alert.Tracker
member.summary: Gets or sets the tracker which caused the alert.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.Alert.Vehicle
member.summary: Gets or sets the vehicle which caused the alert.

member.name: T:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.DtcAlertPolicy
member.summary: Represents DTC-code alert policy. Fires in response to the new DTC-code within the 48 hours time frame.

member.name: T:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.FatigueAlertPolicy
member.summary: Represents fatigue alert policy. Fires when the vehicle driver drives too long in context of a single trip.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.FatigueAlertPolicy.MaxDrivingTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximal allowed duration of the continuous driving within a single trip.

member.name: T:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.GeofenceBorderAlertPolicy
member.summary: Represents geofence border alert policy. Fires when the vehicle crosses the border of the specified geofence(s).

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.GeofenceBorderAlertPolicy.FireOn
member.summary: Gets or sets the events used to fire the alert.

member.name: T:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.GeofenceAlertPolicyEvents
member.summary: Enumerates the events used by the .

member.name: F:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.GeofenceAlertPolicyEvents.Enter
member.summary: Vehicle enters the geofence.

member.name: F:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.GeofenceAlertPolicyEvents.Exit
member.summary: Vehicle exits the geofence.

member.name: T:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.GeofenceSpeedAlertPolicy
member.summary: Represents geofence speed alert policy. Fires when the specified speed is reached within the specified geofence.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.GeofenceSpeedAlertPolicy.MaxSpeed
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximal speed allowed within the geofence (km/h).

member.name: T:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.GeofenceAlertPolicy
member.summary: Represents abstract alert policy which may reference multiple geofences.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.GeofenceAlertPolicy.GeofenceAlertPolicyGeofences
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of the connections between this alert policy and related geofences.

member.name: T:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.IdleAlertPolicy
member.summary: Represents idle alert policy. Fires in response to continuous idle.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.IdleAlertPolicy.MaxIdleTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximal allowed duration of the continuous idle.

member.name: T:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.IgnitionAlertPolicy
member.summary: Represents idle alert policy. Fires when the engine started or stopped.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.IgnitionAlertPolicy.FireOn
member.summary: Gets or sets the events used to fire the alert.

member.name: T:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.IgnitionAlertPolicyEvents
member.summary: Enumerates the events used by the .

member.name: F:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.IgnitionAlertPolicyEvents.Start
member.summary: Engine was started.

member.name: F:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.IgnitionAlertPolicyEvents.Stop
member.summary: Engine was stopped.

member.name: T:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.LowBatteryAlertPolicy
member.summary: Represents low battery alert policy. Fires when the battery voltage decreases to the specific value. TODO: Add minimal battery percentage in future?

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.LowBatteryAlertPolicy.MinVoltage
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimal allowed battery voltage (volts).

member.name: T:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.MaxSpeedAlertPolicy
member.summary: Represents max speed alert policy. Fires when the vehicle speed increases to the specific value.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.MaxSpeedAlertPolicy.MaxSpeed
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximal allowed speed (km/h).

member.name: T:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.MileageAlertPolicy
member.summary: Represents mileage alert policy. Fires when the vehicle travels the specific distance within the specified time frame.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.MileageAlertPolicy.TimeFrame
member.summary: Gets or sets the time frame used to measure the traveled distance.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.MileageAlertPolicy.MaxDistance
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximal allowed distance (km).

member.name: T:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.SpeedLimitAlertPolicy
member.summary: Represents speed limit alert policy. Fires when the vehicle violates the speed limit during the trip.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.SpeedLimitAlertPolicy.AllowedOverspeed
member.summary: Gets or set the allowed overspeed (km/h).

member.name: T:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.AlertPolicy
member.summary: Represents user-defined alert policy settings.

member.summary: Gets or sets the unique alert policy ID.

member.summary: Gets or sets the ID of the company which this alert policy is create for.

member.summary: Gets or sets the ID of the user who created the policy.

member.summary: Gets or sets the user-defined alert policy name.

member.summary: Gets or sets the user-defined alert policy description.

member.summary: Gets or sets the flag which determines if the alert policy should be applied to all the trackers within the company defined by the .

member.summary: Gets or sets the flag which determines if alert is deleted.

member.summary: Gets or sets the flag which determines if alert is enabled.

member.summary: Gets or sets the company.

member.summary: Gets or sets user who created the policy.

member.summary: Gets or sets the list of connections between the alert policy and vehicles.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.AlertPolicy.Alerts
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of the alerts caused by this alert policy.

member.summary: Represents the alert generated by the .

member.summary: Represents the alert generated by the .

member.name: T:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.Company
member.summary: Represents company.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.Company.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique company ID.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.Company.ParentId
member.summary: Gets or sets the ID of the parent company.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.Company.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the company.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.Company.CreateDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the record create date. Technically it is the company registration date.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.Company.DeleteDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the date of company deletion. Null means that company is not deleted yet.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.Company.IsSuspended
member.summary: Gets or sets the flag which determines if the company is suspended (i.e. we are not providing them our service).

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.Company.Parent
member.summary: Gets or sets the parent company.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.Company.Children
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of child companies.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.Company.Vehicles
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of vehicles created for this company.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.Company.Geofences
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of geofences created for this company.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.Company.CompanyTrackers
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of connections between the company and it's trackers.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.Company.AlertPolicies
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of alert policies created for this company.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.Company.CompanyUsers
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of connections between the company and it's users.

member.name: T:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.Geofence
member.summary: Represents the geofence (i.e. some user-defined area which may be used to )

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.Geofence.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique geofence ID.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.Geofence.CompanyId
member.summary: Gets or sets the ID of the company which owns the geofence.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.Geofence.CreateDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the record create date.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.Geofence.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the user-defined geofence name.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.Geofence.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets the user-defined geofence description.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.Geofence.Geometry
member.summary: Gets or sets the user-defined geofence geometry. For now it should be some figure with area (polygon, circle, etc...).

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.Geofence.Thickness
member.summary: Gets or sets geometry thickness. If set then the geofence area will be defined by edges (with some thickness) of the figure defined by .

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.Geofence.Color
member.summary: Gets or sets the user-defined geofence color. Should be defined as the hex-encoded RGB without leading '#' (for example "990AFA" will define violet).

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.Geofence.IsDeleted
member.summary: Gets or sets the flag which determines if geofence is deleted.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.Geofence.Company
member.summary: Gets or sets the company this geofence was created by.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.Geofence.GeofenceAlertPolicyGeofences
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of connections between the geofence and the geofence alert policies based on it.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.Geofence.GeofenceAlerts
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of geofence alerts based on this geofence.

member.summary: Gets or sets the alert policy.

member.summary: Gets or sets the vehicle which the alert policy should be applied to.

member.name: T:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.Tracker
member.summary: Represents tracking device.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.Tracker.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the tracker ID (IMEI).

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.Tracker.OldId
member.summary: Gets or the ID of the tracker as it was in previous DB. TODO: Deal with it later as we decide with the new vehicle management BL.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.Tracker.VehicleId
member.summary: Gets or sets the ID of the vehicle the tracker is installed on.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.Tracker.CreateDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the record create date. Technically it is the date of the first tracker record.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.Tracker.Vehicle
member.summary: Gets or sets the vehicle the tracker is installed on at the moment.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.Tracker.CompanyTrackers
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of connections between the tracker and it's companies. Note that the new trackers has no records in this list and should be assigned to specific companies manually.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.Tracker.Alerts
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of the alerts caused by this tracker.

member.name: T:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.RouteSegment
member.summary: Represents tracker route segment (idle or trip, see ).

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.RouteSegment.TrackerId
member.summary: Gets or sets the ID of the tracker which owns this route segment.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.RouteSegment.StartDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the start date (UTC) of the route segment.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.RouteSegment.FinishDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the finish date (UTC) of the route segment. The value is set once while route segment closing (in order to avoid frequent updates).

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.RouteSegment.Type
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the route segment.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.RouteSegment.Stats
member.summary: Gets or sets route segment's statistics. The value is set periodically (in order to avoid frequent updates).

member.name: T:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.RouteSegment.SegmentType
member.summary: Enumerates types of the tracker path segment.

member.name: F:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.RouteSegment.SegmentType.Idle
member.summary: Path segment created for stopped engine.

member.name: F:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.RouteSegment.SegmentType.Trip
member.summary: Path segment created for started engine.

member.name: T:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.RouteSegment.SegmentStats
member.summary: Represents path segment's statistics.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.RouteSegment.SegmentStats.MaxSpeed
member.summary: Gets or sets the peak speed during the trip, km/h.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.RouteSegment.SegmentStats.TotalIdleDuration
member.summary: Gets or sets the total amount of time while the vehicle wasn't moving.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.RouteSegment.SegmentStats.MaxIdleDuration
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximal amount of time while the vehicle wasn't moving.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.RouteSegment.SegmentStats.TimeSpentInSuburb
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of time spent in suburb.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.RouteSegment.SegmentStats.TimeSpentInCity
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of time spent in city.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.RouteSegment.SegmentStats.TimeSpentOnHighway
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of time spent on highway.

member.name: T:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.SensorRecord
member.summary: Represents abstract sensor data record.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.SensorRecord.SensorId
member.summary: Gets or sets the sensor ID.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.SensorRecord.Type
member.summary: Gets or sets the sensor type.

member.name: T:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.SensorRecord.SensorType
member.summary: Enumerates sensor types.

member.name: F:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.SensorRecord.SensorType.Rs232
member.summary: RS232 sensor.

member.name: F:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.SensorRecord.SensorType.Ble
member.summary: BLE (Bluetooth Low Energy) sensor.

member.name: T:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.BleStatusSensorRecord
member.summary: Represents BLE sensor status record. Used to track sensor's state and store sensor-related alarms (like low battery alarm).

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.BleStatusSensorRecord.Rssi
member.summary: Gets or sets the RSSI (Received Signal Strength Indicator), dBm. Null means that sensor doesn't report the signal strength.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.BleStatusSensorRecord.BatteryVoltage
member.summary: Gets or sets the sensor's battery voltage, mV. Null means that sensor doesn't report the battery voltage.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.BleStatusSensorRecord.BatteryPercentage
member.summary: Gets or sets the sensor's battery level, percents. Null means that sensor doesn't report the battery level.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.BleStatusSensorRecord.IsBatteryLow
member.summary: Gets or sets the flag which determines if the sensor's battery charge is low. Null means that sensor doesn't report this flag.

member.name: T:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.DoorSensorRecord
member.summary: Represents door sensor record.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.DoorSensorRecord.IsOpen
member.summary: Gets or sets the flag which determines if the door is opened.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.DoorSensorRecord.Temperature
member.summary: Gets or sets the temperature near the sensor, °C.

member.name: T:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.DriverIdSensorRecord
member.summary: Represents driver identification sensor record.

member.summary: Gets or sets sensor's internal mechanism.

member.summary: Gets or sets driver identification data.

member.name: T:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.DriverIdSensorRecord.SensorMechanism
member.summary: Enumerates kinds of driver identification sensors.

member.summary: General type, reports just the fact of identification (without any data).

member.summary: Fingerprint reader.

member.name: F:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.DriverIdSensorRecord.SensorMechanism.Rfid
member.summary: RFID (radio-frequency identification) reader.

member.summary: Gets or sets the humidity level, percents.

member.summary: Gets or sets the temperature near the sensor, °C.

member.summary: Gets or sets the flag which determines if the light is on.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.EnvironmentSensorRecord.LightIntensity
member.summary: Gets or sets the light intensity, percents.

member.name: T:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.LevelSensorRecord
member.summary: Represents (liquid) level sensor. Used to measure diesel/petrol/water levels within the corresponding tanks.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.LevelSensorRecord.Mechanism
member.summary: Gets or sets sensor's internal mechanism.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.LevelSensorRecord.RemainingPercentage
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of remaining liquid, percents.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.LevelSensorRecord.State
member.summary: Gets or sets the tank state.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.LevelSensorRecord.RemainingHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets the height of the remaining liquid, millimeters.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.LevelSensorRecord.TotalHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets total tank height, millimeters.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.LevelSensorRecord.Temperature
member.summary: Gets liquid temperature, °C.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.LevelSensorRecord.Liquid
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the liquid within a tank.

member.name: T:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.LevelSensorRecord.SensorMechanism
member.summary: Enumerates kinds of level sensors.

member.name: F:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.LevelSensorRecord.SensorMechanism.Capacitor
member.summary: Capacitor level sensor, provides relative liquid level (percents).

member.name: F:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.LevelSensorRecord.SensorMechanism.Ultrasonic
member.summary: Ultrasonic level sensor, provides absolute liquid level (millimeters).

member.summary: Enumerates types of the liquids.

member.summary: Diesel.

member.summary: Petrol (gasoline).

member.name: F:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.LevelSensorRecord.LiquidType.Water
member.summary: Water.

member.summary: Normal state.

member.summary: Tank is filling.

member.summary: Gets or sets the temperature near the sensor, °C.

member.summary: Represents SOS sensor record.

member.summary: Gets or sets the air pressure within a tire, Pa.

member.summary: Gets or sets the air temperature within a tire, °C.

member.summary: Gets or sets the wheel status.

member.summary: Normal.

member.summary: Wheel is leaking.

member.summary: Wheel is refilling.

member.summary: Wheel is rolling.

member.name: T:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.TrackerRecord
member.summary: Represents abstract tracking data record.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.TrackerRecord.TrackerId
member.summary: Gets or sets the ID of the tracker which generated this record.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.TrackerRecord.TrackerDate
member.summary: Gets or sets a moment in time (UTC) when the record was retrieved by the tracker.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.TrackerRecord.VehicleId
member.summary: Gets or sets the ID of the vehicle the tracker was installed on while generating this data record.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.TrackerRecord.RouteSegmentStartDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the start date of the corresponding . Used to retrieve the corresponding route segment (using both and ).

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.TrackerRecord.Tracker
member.summary: Gets or sets the tracker which generated this data record.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.TrackerRecord.Vehicle
member.summary: Gets or sets the vehicle the tracker was installed on while generating this data record.

member.name: T:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.CommonTrackerRecord
member.summary: Represents tracker data record which stores location-related data.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.CommonTrackerRecord.IsEngineStarted
member.summary: Gets or sets the flag which determines if the engine is started.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.CommonTrackerRecord.IsEngineLocked
member.summary: Gets or sets the flag which determines if the engine is locked.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.CommonTrackerRecord.EngineTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the total engine time.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.CommonTrackerRecord.IdleTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of time the vehicle was not moving with the started engine. TODO: Still can't understand how we will calculate this, I think it should be part of the trip.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.CommonTrackerRecord.NetworkSignalStrength
member.summary: Gets or sets the network signal strength, percents.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.CommonTrackerRecord.Odometer
member.summary: Gets or sets the odometer value, meters.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.CommonTrackerRecord.InternalBatteryVoltage
member.summary: Gets or sets the internal battery voltage, volts.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.CommonTrackerRecord.ExternalBatteryVoltage
member.summary: Gets or sets the external battery voltage, volts.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.CommonTrackerRecord.Route
member.summary: Gets or sets the route-related data (position, direction, speed).

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.CommonTrackerRecord.GpsInfo
member.summary: Gets or sets the GPS-related data.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.CommonTrackerRecord.Accelerometer
member.summary: Gets or sets the accelerometer data.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.CommonTrackerRecord.Gyroscope
member.summary: Gets or sets the gyroscope data.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.CommonTrackerRecord.SolarPanel
member.summary: Gets or sets the solar panel data.

member.name: T:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.CommonTrackerRecord.RouteData
member.summary: Represents route-related data.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.CommonTrackerRecord.RouteData.Location
member.summary: Gets or sets the GPS location. X stands for longitude in range [-180, 180]. Y stands for latitude in range [-90, 90]. Z (optional) stands for altitude (meters).

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.CommonTrackerRecord.RouteData.Direction
member.summary: Gets or sets the movement direction as the CW angle (degrees) from the meridian line (0 - north, 90 - east, 180 - south, 270 - west).

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.CommonTrackerRecord.RouteData.Speed
member.summary: Gets or sets the moving speed, km/h.

member.name: T:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.CommonTrackerRecord.GpsInfoData
member.summary: Represents GPS-related information.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.CommonTrackerRecord.GpsInfoData.IsInWorkingMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the flag which determines if GPS was in working or sleeping mode.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.CommonTrackerRecord.GpsInfoData.SatellitesCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of satellites the tracker was connected to.

member.summary: Represents accelerometer vector.

member.summary: Gets or sets the X axis acceleration, g.

member.summary: Gets or sets the Y axis acceleration, g.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.CommonTrackerRecord.AccelerometerData.Z
member.summary: Gets or sets the Z axis acceleration, g.

member.summary: Represents gyroscope vector.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.CommonTrackerRecord.GyroscopeData.X
member.summary: Gets or sets the X axis rotation speed, dps.

member.summary: Gets or sets the Y axis rotation speed, dps.

member.name: P:Telemax.Shared.ClientDb.Entities.CommonTrackerRecord.GyroscopeData.Z
member.summary: Gets or sets the Z axis rotation speed, dps.

member.summary: Represents solar panel data.

member.summary: Gets or sets the solar panel voltage (volts).

member.summary: Gets or sets the flag which determines if the solar panel charges the device battery.

member.summary: Gets or sets the mobile network access technology name (GSM, EDGE, etc...).

member.summary: Gets or sets the mobile network band name (GSM 850, LTE BAND 28, etc...).

member.summary: Gets or sets the flag which determines if the user has been deleted.
